description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016

Michael Brunton-Spall - Senior Technical Architect at The Government Digital Service

ABSTRACT
I believe that agile methods of development and operation can lead to more securely designed and operated systems than is possible via non agile methods. But doing so requires work and thought.
Agile methodologies however have generally been said [...]
